name: Ultralingua
tag_list: software, language, apps, iphone, ipad, mac, language-learning, spanish, french, development
description: Language apps for iPhone, Mac, Windows
overview:
We make software for people who love languages.

Our products include dictionaries of definitions and language translations, spelling and grammar checkers, audio-based language lessons, and travel tools such as phrasebooks. We specialize in the tools that make multi-lingual business, travel, and learning possible.

Our mission is to put the power of language at the worldâ€™s fingertips. We do this by developing high quality language tools for a wide variety of electronic platforms including iPhone, Mac, Windows, Windows Mobile, Palm, and the web.

Ultralinguaâ€™s dictionaries are compiled by a team of language professionals, including linguists, university professors, and professional translators. The database management and user interface are based on cutting edge research in the field of lexicography.

Our customers include teachers, students, translators, and multi-lingual professionals from a host of industries. We sell to many organizations who purchase site licenses, while hardware, software, and internet companies are also customers for embedded OEM (bundled with other hardware), APIs (embedded in other software), and Web Versions of our products.
